articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.title: All the news from OpenAI’s first developer conference
articles.description: OpenAI, the creator of ChatGPT and Dall-E, is announcing new products and updates at its first developer conference, OpenAI DevDay. We’ll be covering it live. Look for news on ChatGPT 4, a custom GPT creator, and more.
articles.content:
It has been almost a year since OpenAI released ChatGPT to the public, kicking off the generative AI boom that has quickly reshaped the tech industry.
Since then, OpenAI has been racing to maintain … [+1296 chars]

articles.title: Cities: Skylines II developer delays DLC to to focus on fixing the base game

articles.title: Reddit is starting to test its own add-ons for the platform
articles.description: Reddit is beginning to test the first of its own add-ons built through its Developer Platform, including tools for mods and posts that are live scoreboards.
